project.description: Reads index-records and indexes into SOLR

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: includeSampling
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include sampling in the index. This requires that sampling has been run beforehand.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: includeJackKnife
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Include jackknife results in the index. This requires that sampling has been run beforehand.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: includeClustering
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Including clustering results in index. This requires that clustering has been run beforehand.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "$cluster" = "ClusterA" ]; then echo 'Will use Cluster A' config="/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines.yaml,/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines-local.yaml,/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines-cluster-a.yaml" else echo 'Will use Cluster B' config="/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines.yaml,/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines-local.yaml,/data/la-pipelines/config/la-pipelines-cluster-b.yaml" fi
sudo -u spark la-pipelines solr all --cluster --config="$config" --extra-args="includeSampling=$includeSampling,includeJackKnife=$includeJackKnife,includeClustering=$includeClustering,solrCollection=$collectionName"
